import React from 'react' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { addItem } from '../../redux/cart/cart.actions' import CustomButton from '../custom-button/CustomButton' import './collectionItem.scss' const CollectionItem = ({ item }) => { const { name, price, imageUrl } = item const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
{name} {price}
dispatch(addItem(item))}> ADD TO CART
) } export default CollectionItem
